message: I propose dividing the money 3:2 in favor of Alice. This offers a fair compromise considering the diminishing value of money over time.
I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  This accounts for the greater devaluation of your money over time. I believe it's a fair compromise.
I propose an equal division of the money, recognizing the decreasing value of both our portions due to inflation. This ensures fairness for both parties.
